snippet: The Revs Program at Stanford University has been at the vanguard of the new movement to create a repository of automotive history. It has already received the archives of Road & Track magazine.
abstract: Revs Program at Stanford University, founded to create repository of automotive history, will receive archives of Road & Track magazine from Hearst Publishing.
lead_paragraph: The Revs Program at Stanford University has been at the vanguard of the new movement to create a repository of automotive history. It has already received the archives of Road & Track magazine.

headline.seo: Auto Archives Land in Safe Havens
headline.main: Auto Archives Land in Safe Havens
headline.print_headline: Auto Archives Land In Safe Havens
